statement.tex: \text{Find the product of the following}\\ \text{matrix multiplication.}\\ \left[\begin{array}{cc} a & b \\ -b & a \end{array} \right] \times \left[\begin{array}{cc} a & -b \\ b & a \end{array} \right]

step.context: \text{Under what condition, the product of}\\ \text{two matrices, }A_{m \times n} \times B_{p \times q} \text{ is defined?}
step.tex: \text{If order of A } = \text{order of B}\\ \, \text{i.e. }m = p \text{ and }n = q

step.context: \text{If } P = A_{m \times n} \times B_{ n \times p} \text{ then, what is the}\\ \text{order of the product matrix P?}
step.reason: A_{m \times n} \times B_{n \times p} = P_{m \times p}\\ \text{having m rows and p columns.}

step.context:
\text{What is the product of the following matrix}\\ \text{multiplication }
\left[\begin{array}{cc} a & b \\ -b & a \end{array} \right] \times \left[\begin{array}{cc} a & -b \\ b & a \end{array} \right] ?
step.tex:
= \left[\begin{array}{ll} a \cdot a + b\cdot b \quad & a \cdot (-b) +b \cdot a \\ (-b) \cdot a + a \cdot b \quad & (-b) \cdot (-b) + a\cdot a \end{array} \right] \\
= \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 + b^2 & 0 \\ 0 & a^2 + b^2 \end{array} \right]
= \left[\begin{array}{cc} a\cdot a & b \cdot (-b) \\ (-b) \cdot b & a \cdot a \end{array} \right] \\ = \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 & -b^2 \\ -b^2 & a^2 \end{array} \right]
